rows.label: qst104905_msg0001
rows.name:
Handsome gentleman... Please
remember how you fought.

rows.label: qst104905_msg0002
rows.name:
I will be writing furiously,
using your words as a reference!

rows.label: qst104905_msg0101
rows.name:
I'd prefer it if a handsome
gentleman defeated the monsters...

rows.label: qst104905_msg0102
rows.name:
It's fine if someone else defeats
them, but please have a handsome
gentleman narrate the battle~
